info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 5:28PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL KERN AND SOUTHEASTERN TULARE COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM PDT... At 527 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Bodfish, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Bodfish, Lake Isabella, Glennville, and Democrat. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
